definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

pinyin: chao1 wen2 ben3 chuan2 shu1 xie2 ding4
chao1 wen2 ben3 chuan2 song4 xie2 yi4
chao1 wen2 ben3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: PHP stands for PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor.
This class features hypertext student projects in the projects section.
sentences.chinese: 此课程在专题区有超文本的学生专题。

sentences.english: The venerable Hypertext Markup Language is getting a face lift, too.
sentences.chinese: 流行的超文本标记语言也正在进行大变脸。

sentences.english: Hyper -text is a collection of text documents which are linked to each other.
sentences.chinese: 超文本是一种与彼此有关系的正文资料的收集。

sentences.english: Hyperlinks are actually threads that links certain words to their explanations.
sentences.chinese: 超文本链接实际是将特定单词链接到其解释的细线。

sentences.english: A hypertext system is mainly determined through non-linear links of information.
sentences.chinese: 超文本系统主要通过信息的非线性链接决定。

sentences.english: Hypertext creates it own possibility space. As Jay David Bolter writes in his outstanding, but little known book, Writing Spaces
sentences.chinese: 超文本为自己创造了可能性空间。

sentences.english: Wiki is a simple, yet powerful hypertext system.
sentences.chinese: Wiki是一个简单的但功能强大的超文本系统。

sentences.english: Hypertext and electronic writing accelerate that reciprocity.
sentences.chinese: 超文本和电子书写促进了这种互惠作用。

pinyin: chao1 wen2 ben3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2

definition: variant of 因特網|因特网[Yin1 te4 wang3], Internet

pinyin: ke3 kuo4 zhan3 biao1 ji4 yu3 yan2
